archimate:Assessment.name: Inconsistent architecture resourcing
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
In many places architects are missing, leaving non architects to attempt the work of architects. For example, UMN has not had a service architect for several years, and because of this, it is hard to raise the level of security there.
Typically, service managers or other roles try to fill mandatory requirements, but without proper training and skills we end up with the inconsistent skilling vulnerability. It makes it very difficult to apply control where we cannot identify who has responsibility. In many places architects are missing, leaving non architects to attempt the work of architects.
